org.apache.pulsar.client.api.schema

接口 FieldSchemaBuilder<S extends FieldSchemaBuilder<S>>


  • public interface FieldSchemaBuilder<S extends FieldSchemaBuilder<S>>
    Build a field for a record.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      S aliases(String... aliases)
      The optional name aliases of this field.
      S defaultValue(Object value)
      Set the default value of this field.
      S doc(String doc)
      The documentation of this field.
      S optional()
      Make this field optional.
      S property(String name, String val)
      Set name-value pair properties for this field.
      S required()
      Make this field required.
      S type(SchemaType type)
      The type of this field.

    • 方法详细资料

      • property

        S property(String name,
           String val)
        Set name-value pair properties for this field.
        参数:
        name - name of the property
        val - value of the property
        返回:
        field schema builder

      • doc

        S doc(String doc)
        The documentation of this field.
        参数:
        doc - documentation
        返回:
        field schema builder

      • aliases

        S aliases(String... aliases)
        The optional name aliases of this field.
        参数:
        aliases - the name aliases of this field
        返回:
        field schema builder

      • type

        S type(SchemaType type)
        The type of this field.

        Currently only primitive types are supported.

        参数:
        type - schema type of this field
        返回:
        field schema builder

      • optional

        S optional()
        Make this field optional.
        返回:
        field schema builder

      • required

        S required()
        Make this field required.
        返回:
        field schema builder

      • defaultValue

        S defaultValue(Object value)
        Set the default value of this field.

        The value is validated against the schema type.

        返回:
        value
